Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the porch of the farmhouse

The porch extends a meter from the front wall of the farmhouse, barred on all three sides with a gnarled, oak railing. Three windows and the double doors make up the face with a rocking chair and stools set on the decking. A short set of steps lead out of the farmhouse.
Relatively small, the porch is decorated with a few pieces of furniture, matching the rest of the drab, oaken farmhouse.
The porch extends a meter from the front wall of the farmhouse, barred on all three sides with a gnarled, oak railing.
http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/outoftown/FarmNE/ic_farmporch.jpg
the large double doors
the steps leading south
the fitted oak decking
The floor beneath is fitted together with long oak planks. Whorls and knots add character to the grain of wood.
The floor beneath is fitted together with long oak planks.
the eastern oak banister
The eastern banister is built up of gnarled oak planks. Whorls and knots add character to the grain of wood.
The eastern banister is built up of gnarled oak planks.
the northern oak wall

The northern wall is fitted together with long oak planks. Whorls and knots add character to the grain of wood. A pair of large, double doors lead into the farmhouse from here. It is flanked on either side by windows.
The northern wall is fitted together with long oak planks.
the southern oak banister
The southern wall is built up of gnarled oak planks. Whorls and knots add character to the grain of wood. A short set of steps lead out from here.
The southern wall is built up of gnarled oak planks.
the western oak banister
The western wall is built up of gnarled oak planks. Whorls and knots add character to the grain of wood.
The western wall is built up of gnarled oak planks.
the oak wall and banisters
There are walls surrounding the room. They are fitted together with long and gnarled oak planks. Whorls and knots add character to the grain of wood.
There are walls surrounding the room. They are fitted together with long and gnarled oak planks.
the left dining room window

The left of two cloudy windows that dominate the right-hand side of the northern wall, small and crudely fitted together with thin oaken spokes. A set of musty, velvet drapes cover the glass panes on the inside.
The left of two cloudy windows that dominate the right-hand side of the northern wall. They are ill-fitting and typically covered on the inside with a set of musty, velvet curtains.
the right dining room window

The right of two cloudy windows that dominate the right-hand side of the northern wall, small and crudely fitted together with thin oaken spokes. A set of musty, velvet drapes cover the glass panes on the inside.
The right of two cloudy windows that dominate the right-hand side of the northern wall. They are ill-fitting and typically covered on the inside with a set of musty, velvet curtains.
the living room window
Built into the left-hand side of the north wall is a basic glass window framed in oak, and skirted on the inside with dark green paisley curtains. It allows for a view of the indoors.
Built into the left-hand side of the north wall is a basic glass window skirted on the inside with dark green paisley curtains.
set of small windows

A pair of cloudy, dining room windows dominate the right-hand side of the northern wall, small and crudely fitted together with thin oaken spokes, with a living room window stands to the left-hand side.
A pair of cloudy, dining room windows dominate the right-hand side of the northern wall, with a living room window stands to the left-hand side.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \\ \{ The temperature is quite chilly and damp, with the sky overhead clear and tinged pink by the slow rise of the sun. \}\\ \{ The temperature is mild and refreshing. The sky overhead is mostly clear, allowing the slowly rising sun to gradually burn off the fog on the horizon. \} \\ \{ The air is chilly and cool, damp with the fog that is slowly dissipating with the rise of the early morning sun. \| Misty fingers of fog cling to the edges of the horizon. \| A soft chilly breeze kisses the fog, sending it swirling in soft patterns. \| The pink rose glow of dawn tinges the fading fog with soft color. \| A chilly breeze passes through the area. \| Geese can be heard in the distance, flying south with the rise of the morning sun. \| The air is chilly and scented by autumn leaves and wood smoke. \| A gentle breeze sweeps passed, bringing with it scents of autumn. \| A lone leaf skates by on the ground. \| The dawn sun slowly rises, kissing the area with hues of pink. \} \\ \{ The sky overhead is crystal clear, causing the temperature to become bitterly cold as the sun very slowly rises with hues of pink and gold from the east. \} \\ \} \{ \\ \{ The temperature is chilly and the air damp. The morning sky overhead is clear and brilliant blue. \} \\ \{ The sky overhead is clear and bright blue, the morning sun warm with just a light breeze. \} \\ \{ The morning sky overhead is partly cloudy, the air cool with a light breeze. \| A few fluffy clouds skate across the blue sky overhead. \| A chilly breeze drifts through, carrying with it a lone autumn leaf. \| Morning sun streams down from the partly cloudy sky, warming the air just a bit despite the autumn chill. \| The clouds above are bright and wispy, glowing luminescent in the morning sunshine. \| Distant birdsong wafts in on the chilly breeze. \| A soft breeze scented of apples and mulling spices drifts through the area. \| A swirl of autumn leaves glowing bright in the morning sun skates through the area on the breeze. \| Breeze-born scents of wood smoke and mulled cider infuse the area with the aroma of fall. \| The blue sky above is partially concealed behind white clouds. \} \\ \{ The morning sky overhead is growing cloudy, the air cold and damp. \} \\ \} \{ \\ \{ The midday sun streaming down from the partly cloudy, blue sky above lending warmth to the spring-scented breeze. \} \\ \{ The sun streaming down from the clear blue sky above infuses the light breeze with the intense heat of the summer season. \} \\ \{ The sky above is cloudy, a light rain shower passing by on the damp, chilly autumnal breeze. \| The light grey clouds above skate on a chilly damp breeze. \| Rain gently patters down, cool with the autumn breeze. \| Wet leaves scent the air as the rain continues to gently fall from above. \| Rain droplets smatter the ground around you, the air growing damp and cooler. \| The midday sun struggles to break through the rain clouds above. \| The area is infused with a dreary light as the midday sun hides behind the rain clouds above. \| The rainfall waxes and wanes with each passing breeze. \| Momentarily clearing, the rainfall lessens just a bit before resuming again. \| Rays of sun creep through the clouds above as the rain storm lessens. \} \\ \{The sky overhead is gloomy with heavy cloud cover, a light snow drifting down to coat the ground with a fresh layer of powder. \} \\ \} \{ \\ \{ The sky above is partly cloudy, intermittent spring showers falling occasionally from above. \| The breeze is warm and scented with the damp freshness of spring. \} \\ \{ The sun beats down, making the area hot and slightly humid. \| A gentle wind, occasionally gusting, brings only a mild amount of refreshment. \} \\ \{ The sky overhead is slowly clearing, the breeze chilly and scented by the rich aromas of the autumn season. \| An occasional drizzle falls, barely enough to dampen the ground as the cloud cover begins to clear from the sky. \| The breeze is damp and chilly as it swishes lightly through the area. \| The afternoon sun slants through the clearing skies above, warm on your skin despite the chill of the air. \| The sound of geese in the distance drifts in with the breeze. \| Scented of apple cider and warm wood smoke, the breeze is cool. \| A few damp leaves drift heavy on the light breeze before landing on the ground below. \| Soft chirps of bird call overhead can be heard as they flit busily in search of food. \| A faint gust of cold wind swishes through the area, scented by aromas of damp leaves and ripe apples. \| Rays of afternoon sun break through the dissipating clouds in streams of golden light. \} \\ \{ The sky above is only partly cloudy, the thin wisps skating rapidly by with the brisk, cold winter winds \}\\ \} \{ \\ \{ The warmth of spring lingers as the setting sun paints the partly cloudy skies in hues of red, gold and deep purple. \} \\ \{ The hot summer wind builds in strength as thunderclouds gather far off on the horizon, painted deep red and tyrian purple by the setting of the sun. \} \\ \{ The air is warm and smells of autumn, the clear skies painted red, gold and orange by the setting of the sun. \| The sun slowly descends toward the western horizon, the light growing red and gold. \| The late evening sun warms the area, lessening the chill if only for a while. \| Autumn leaves and the scents of distant cook fires infuse the breeze with rich aroma. \| The sky above shifts in colors of gold and orange, the horizon growing deeper red as the sun slowly sinks. \| A swirl of leaves born on a gentle breeze coasts through the area. \| The world is cast in hues of red and gold as the sun dips lower on the western horizon. \| A cool breeze drifts through, carrying with it the aroma of fall. \| The sky continues to grow darker as the western horizon glows deep red with the sunset. \| As the sun dips lower on the western horizon, the air hold residual warmth against the chilly night breeze. \} \\ \{ The skies above are cloudy and painted in moody hues of deep purple and pale yellow-gold by the setting of the sun. \| Flurries are falling, gently dusting the ground in fresh powdery snow. \} \\ \} \{ \ \{\ \{ The air is slightly warm, the sky above partly cloudy and allowing only passing glimpses of the stars above. \| A damp breeze blows through occasionally. \}\\ \{ The sky above is filled with heavy cloud cover, lightning accompanied by the deep rumbling of thunder occasionally lancing through the clouds as a persistent downpour drenches the ground. \} \\ \{ The starlit sky overhead is free of clouds, the autumn air cool and kissed by a light breeze. \| Stars twinkle in the clear sky overhead. \| A light, cool breeze blows through, crisp with the autumn chill. \| The night air is chilly with a light breeze. \| A lone autumn leaf floats down, drifting on an errant chilly breeze. \| Scents of wood smoke and autumn leaves are carried through on a cool gust of wind. \| The clear night sky overhead shimmers with starlight. \| A light breeze drifts through the area, carrying with it the scent of ripe apples. \| A soft rustle can be heard as an autumn leaf skates over the ground. \| A chilly breeze buffets your cheeks, reminding you of the impending cold of winter in your future. \} \\ \{ The night sky is filled with heavy, dark cloud cover, a heavy snow falling silently down to cover the ground with a thick layer of fresh powder. \} \ \}\ \}\{ \\ \{ The sky is partially covered by light cloud cover, allowing only scant views of the stars above. \| A light spring shower falls over the area, the breeze chilly and damp. \} \\ \{ The sky is cloudy and a light rain continues to fall as the thunderstorm travels further away into the distance. \| The wind shifts gradually into a gentle breeze, fresh with the scent of rain. \} \\ \{ The night sky is partly clouded over, allowing only scant glimpses of the stars above. \| A cool breeze, richly scented with autumnal aromas, gently skates the clouds over the sky as it moves through the area. \| Clouds cover the sky but skate rapidly by on the breeze, allowing peeks of the starlight beyond. \| A breeze scented by wood smoke and autumn leaves gently brushes your cheek. \| A soft breeze skates an errant autumn leaf over the ground. \| Starlight peeks through the partly cloudy skies above. \| The night air is chilly and damp. \| A swirl of breeze-born leaves drifts over the ground in the distance. \| The air is scented with warmth aromas of fall. \| Light cloud cover coasts slowly through the sky overhead. \} \\ \{ Snow falls, persistent and heavy, from the heavily clouded skies above. \| A cold, gusty wind creates drifting, undulating patterns over the new-fallen snow. \} \\ \} \{ \\ \{ The sky above appears to be gradually clearing of cloud cover, glimpses of the stars filtering between the cloud-wisps as they skate by with the cool breeze. \} \\\{ The clouds above appear to be slowly disappearing, a refreshingly damp, cool breeze pushing them out of sight. \} \\ \{ The air is cool and damp, light rain occasionally falling from the cloudy sky above. \| A chilly rain gently patters down from above. \| The breeze is cold and damp with the light rain showers. \| Autumnal aromas born on the damp breeze smell of wet leaves and wood smoke. \| The rain gently falls from above, pattering softly on the ground. \| The rain falling from the sky is chilly, the light breeze adding to the cold. \| The stars above are hidden from view by the rain clouds in the sky. \| The rain briefly intensifies, falling heavier before slackening once more into a gentle shower. \| The rain briefly lessens into a misty drizzle before becoming rain droplets once more. \| The misty sky briefly opens up, allowing a scant and fleeting view of starlight before clouds close in once more. \| The chilly breeze smells of rain and wet autumn leaves as the rain waxes and wanes. \} \\ \{ A light snow continues to fall as the cloud cover blocking out the sky above slowly begins to dissipate with the cold, wintry wind. \} \\ \}
